name: docker-lambda
description: docker build . -t praguelambdas.azurecr.io/reverser:latest docker push praguelambdas.azurecr.io/reverser:latest  nuctl deploy reverser -n nuclio --run-image praguelambdas.azurecr.io/reverser:latest \     --runtime nodejs \     --handler handler:handler \     --platform kube
author: Microsoft

scripts.deploy: nuctl deploy reverser -n nuclio --run-image praguelambdas.azurecr.io/reverser:latest --runtime nodejs --handler handler:handler --platform kube
scripts.upload: npm run build && npm run push && npm run deploy
